channel.title: [PI] Unipban Command
channel.description:
Hey guys,
So, I was attempting to ban this one user for threatening Staff, but when I found out the Staff Member sorta started it, I attempted to UnIPban the Player, but then I finally notice that there isn't even an unipban Command..
Could someone give me the coding for the command so I can add it into my commands.java...?
All help is appreciated :)

item.title: [PI] Unipban Command
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("unipban") && c.playerRights >= 2) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(6); Connection.removeIpFromBanList(playerToBan); c.sendMessage(playerToBan + " has been unIPbanned."); } catch(Exception e) { //c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unipban Command
item.dc:creator: @Runescape-Xperia Runescape-Xperia
item.description:
@Runescape-Xperia wrote:

fallenlegend:

I know… But everytime I do that, I have to re-compile my server everytime an unipban is deleted… That’s why I need the command, so I don’t have to waste time re-compiling for a stupid unipban…

Don’t have dickheads on your server that need IP-Banning.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unipban Command
item.dc:creator: @fallenlegend fallenlegend
item.description:
@fallenlegend wrote:

kingmoney:

You could unipban him by going to Ipbanned.ini in the source files

I know… But everytime I do that, I have to re-compile my server everytime an unipban is deleted… That’s why I need the command, so I don’t have to waste time re-compiling for a stupid unipban…

Read full topic
